oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Biodiv: Business approach to protect biodiversity in agriculture
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Yun, Tae Yu
Kim, Hong Joe
Park, Jung Ho
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Markets and trade
Biodiversity and ecosystem services
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: To make biodiversity as a standard for selection (purchase), Biodiv Inc. aims at balancing between biodiversity conservation and agricultural productivity that allows farmers to have economic profits.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Yun, Tae Yu; Kim, Hong Joe and Park, Jung Ho (2014) Biodiv: Business approach to protect biodiversity in agriculture. Poster at: IFOAM Organic World Congress 2014, Istanbul, Turkey, 13-15 October 2014. [Completed]
